Achievement.Description: All spells have been obtained.

Achievement.Description: You defeated the Ancient Spirit Magician Fu at the Temple of Enlightenment.

Achievement.Description: Met the secret requirement of the Backyard Heavy Class battle set and won.

Achievement.Title: Middle Class Master
